description: A project entity contains information about the overall project.
title: Project
name: project

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

contributors.description: List of people contributing to any aspect of the project.

supplementary_links.description: External link(s) pointing to code, supplementary data files, or analysis files associated with the project which will not be uploaded.

publications.description: A list of publications resulting from this project.

insdc_project.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) project accession, if project has been submitted. Can be from the DDBJ, NCBI, or EMBL-EBI. Accession must start with DRP, SRP, or ERP.

geo_series.description: GEO accession number, if data has been submitted. Accession must start with GSE.

array_express_investigation.description: EBI ArrayExpress accession number, if data has been submitted.

insdc_study.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) study accession if study has been submitted. Can be from the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI. Accession must start with PRJE, PRJN, or PRJD.

funders.description: A list of funding source(s) supporting the project.
